articles.author: Laura Lynott
articles.title: Covid restrictions Ireland: 'I can't rule them out, it would be reckless to do so' – Varadkar on restrictions as he expects 4000 daily cases - Independent.ie
articles.description: Tánaiste Leo Varadkar said it would be “reckless” to rule out further Covid-19 restrictions, as he revealed the Government is “encouraging” the Europeans Medicines Agency (EMA) to authorise the first pill to treat the virus.

articles.title: WHO: Europe is again at epicenter of pandemic - Axios
articles.description: "We are at another critical point of pandemic resurgence," WHO European director Hans Kluge warned.
